traits.details: The speaker expresses skepticism towards astrology, indicating an openness to critically evaluating ideas and being guided by evidence-based information, but the tone is more critical than enthusiastic, which prevents a higher score.
The speaker confidently expresses their personal beliefs and opinions, indicating a sense of self-assurance and confidence in their ability to form judgments and make decisions.
The speaker takes a clear stance and expresses their opinions, but the tone is more critical and argumentative than assertive and leading.
